_64yf30cyjyuwgq88.name: CVD SPOT

_s27inspepw87p0zf.name: CVD PERP
_s27inspepw87p0zf.script:
buyVol = source(vbuy, type=perp)
sellVol = source(vsell, type=perp)
line(cum(buyVol - sellVol), title=PERP)

binance.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.vbuy+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.vbuy+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcbusd.vbuy+BINANCE:btcusdt.vbuy+BINANCE:btcbusd.vbuy+BINANCE:btcusdc.vbuy)

_vsell = (BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.vsell+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.vsell+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcbusd.vsell+BINANCE:btcusdt.vsell+BINANCE:btcbusd.vsell+BINANCE:btcusdc.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell
is_delta_positive = delta > 0
is_vol_sig = volume > treshold
ohlc = avg_ohlc(bar)
is_candle_up = ohlc.close > ohlc.open

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Binance")
binance.name: BINANCE

bybit.script:
_vbuy = (BYBIT:BTCUSD.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSDT.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSDC-SPOT.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSDT-SPOT.vbuy)

_vsell = (BYBIT:BTCUSD.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSDT.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSDC-SPOT.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSDT-SPOT.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell
is_delta_positive = delta > 0
is_vol_sig = volume > treshold
ohlc = avg_ohlc(bar)
is_candle_up = ohlc.close > ohlc.open

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="BYBIT")
bybit.name: BYBIT

coinbase.name: COINBASE

_vsell = (BITMEX:BTCUSD.vsell+BITMEX:XBTUSD.vsell+BITMEX:XBTUSDT.vsell+BITMEX:XBT_USDT.vsell)

_0em26yp358stc1rw.name: Spot Delta
_0em26yp358stc1rw.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE:btcusdt.vbuy+COINBASE:BTC-USD.vbuy+BITFINEX:BTCUSD.vbuy+BINANCE:btcbusd.vbuy+BITFINEX:BTCUST.vbuy+COINBASE:BTC-USDT.vbuy+BITSTAMP:btcusd.vbuy)
_vsell = (BINANCE:btcusdt.vsell+COINBASE:BTC-USD.vsell+BITFINEX:BTCUSD.vsell+BINANCE:btcbusd.vsell+BITFINEX:BTCUST.vsell+COINBASE:BTC-USDT.vsell+BITSTAMP:btcusd.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Spot Delta")

_695in8juf4cp84jb.name: Futures Delta
_695in8juf4cp84jb.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.vbuy+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.vbuy+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcbusd.vbuy+BITMEX:XBTUSD.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSD.vbuy+DERIBIT:BTC-PERPETUAL.vbuy+BITFINEX:BTCFO:USTFO.vbuy+BITMEX:XBTUSDT.vbuy+BYBIT:BTCUSDT.vbuy+KRAKEN:PI_XBTUSD.vbuy+OKEX:BTC-USD-SWAP.vbuy+OKEX:BTC-USDT-SWAP.vbuy)
_vsell = (BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.vsell+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.vsell+BINANCE_FUTURES:btcbusd.vsell+BITMEX:XBTUSD.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSD.vsell+DERIBIT:BTC-PERPETUAL.vsell+BITFINEX:BTCFO:USTFO.vsell+BITMEX:XBTUSDT.vsell+BYBIT:BTCUSDT.vsell+KRAKEN:PI_XBTUSD.vsell+OKEX:BTC-USD-SWAP.vsell+OKEX:BTC-USDT-SWAP.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Futures Delta")
